email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer the vessel M/V SEA HORIZON for your 12,000 MT steel coils shipment from Rotterdam to Houston on CFR terms.

Freight Rate: USD 45/MT
Laycan: 15-20 October 2023
Vessel Details: DWT 50,000, LOA 200m
Demurrage: USD 10,000 per day, pro rata.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate of USD 45/MT seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Could you consider lowering it to USD 40/MT?

Also, could you confirm the laycan and demurrage details?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
John Doe
Ocean Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-standing relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 42/MT. The laycan remains 15-20 October 2023, and the demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata.

Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 42/MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
John Doe
Ocean Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Rotterdam on 15th October, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
John Doe
Ocean Charterers
